title: Mini-Ep 165: Hearts Wide Open

description:
Kate and Doree chat about a mist for their nostrils, discuss their 2021 intentions and hear from listeners about what they hope the next year holds.


Activity of the Week: Set an intention. Or don’t. But do pat yourself on the back just for getting through another year. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

SQUARESPACE - Head to Squarespace.com/FOREVER35 and use the offer code FOREVER35 to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain.

SWEATY BETTY - Now through December 30th get TWENTY PERCENT OFF your ENTIRE purchase when you visit sweatybetty.com/FOREVER35. and enter FOREVER35 at checkout.

CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.

MASTERCLASS - Visit masterclass.com/forever35 for 15% off the Annual All-Access Pass.

RITUAL - For 10% off during your first three months visit ritual.com/FOREVER35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
